parameters.name: PWMaterialId1
parameters.description: Array of the first IDs of the appearances to delete

parameters.name: PWMaterialId2
parameters.description: Array of the first IDs of the appearances to delete

title: IModelDocExtension.DeleteDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial
description: Deletes the specified appearances, using the IDs of the appearances, from the active configuration.
signature:
System.Boolean DeleteDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial( 
   System.Object
PWMaterialId1
,
   System.Object
PWMaterialId2
)

parameters.name: PWMaterialId1
parameters.description: Array of the first IDs of the appearances to delete

parameters.name: PWMaterialId2
parameters.description: Array of the first IDs of the appearances to delete

returns: True if the appearances are deleted, false if not
remarks:
Call
IRenderMaterial::GetMaterialIds
to the get IDs of the appearances added to the model, then call IModelDocExtension::DeleteDisplayStateSpecificRenderMaterial to delete the appearances.
